price: Şüphesiz Allah, korkup, sakınanlar ve iyilik yapanlarla beraberdir.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
